headline: Assessing Chipotle Stock After 12% Drop and New Store Expansion in 2025
summary: Trying to decide what to do with Chipotle Mexican Grill stock? You are not alone. The past year has been anything but boring for investors watching this restaurant giant. After a multi-year run that would leave most stocks envious, Chipotle has encountered some turbulence. In just the last seven days, the share price dropped 5.9%. Over the past month, it is down 12.3%. Year-to-date, Chipotle is a full 35.5% lower, and even over the past year, the stock has lost 31.2% of its value. Of course,...
